Welcome to Chef’s Hat Gym documentation!

This project aims at providing a multi-agent competitive card game for training and evaluating different learning agents. The Chef’s Hat Environment provides a simple and easy-to-use API, based on the OpenAI GYM interface, for implementing, embedding, deploying, and evaluating reinforcement learning agents.
